A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the lord mayor of London, and the Honourable the Court of Aldermen, and governours of the several hospitals of the city at St. Bridget's Church, on Easter-Tuesday, being one of the anniversary spittal-sermons / by William Hayley./ Hayley, William, 1657-1715.
32 p.
Printed for Jacob Tonson, London : 1700.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

32 p.
Printed for Jacob Tonson, London : 1700.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
